metadata.synopsis: Part of Jaheira behaviour during Siege in the basement. Walks among the harpers and cheers them during battle. Martial. in command. Powerful.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Start Siege in Haven (for example, kill Isobel). Go to the basement and wait Jaheira's AD

0.speaker: Jaheira
0.text: Strike like lightning! Roar like thunder! Wash over them with a blizzard's fury!
